resources.string: 1. The Moderator identifies the person the Werewolves attacked.
2. The person attacked is now out of the game.
3. If the person killed is a Hacktivist.
4. The Hacktivist they attack who they think is a Werewolf.
6. Everyone discuses and decide who they think is the Werewolves so they will be lynched.
7. Someone must be lynched every Day.
